slots.name: default
slots.description: You can put anything inside the default slot, not only images. You will have access to the item and index properties in the slot scope.
slots.description_zh: 您可以将任何内容放在默认插槽中，不仅仅是图像。您将在插槽范围内访问 item 和 index 属性。

slots.name: prev
slots.description: With the arrows prop enabled, use the #prev and #next slots to set the content of the previous and next buttons. You will have access to the disabled property and on-click method in the slot scope.
slots.description_zh: 启用箭头道具后，使用 #prev 和 #next 插槽设置上一个和下一个按钮的内容。您将在插槽范围内访问 disabled 属性和 on-click 方法。

slots.name: next
slots.description: With the arrows prop enabled, use the #prev and #next slots to set the content of the previous and next buttons. You will have access to the disabled property and on-click method in the slot scope.
slots.description_zh: 启用箭头道具后，使用 #prev 和 #next 插槽设置上一个和下一个按钮的内容。您将在插槽范围内访问 disabled 属性和 on-click 方法。

slots.name: indicator
slots.description: With the indicators prop enabled, use the #indicator slot to set the content of the indicators. You will have access to the active, page properties and on-click method in the slot scope.
slots.description_zh: 启用指示器道具后，使用 #indicator 插槽设置指示器的内容。您将在插槽范围内访问 active、page 属性和 on-click 方法。
